user.title: JetAssist
user.description: Connect your Home Assistant to JetAssist.

oauth2.title: Login to JetAssist
oauth2.description: You will be redirected to JetAssist to log in.

token.title: API Token
token.description:
Enter your API token from JetAssist.
Get one at {auth_url} -> Settings -> Tokens & App passwords.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to JetAssist. Check the endpoint and token.
